name: Raccoon city
description:
Soumission de Choccy Milk Studio pour le WonderJam UQAC 2021

You are a rebel trying to save Raccoon City from the evil schemes of your local museum. They are planning to create a machine that turns everyone into fossils and add their bones to the exhibits. You need to steal everything in the museum to prevent people from wanting to go and pay the entrance fees.

No money, no fossil machine

Your organization provided you with a Sneaky Ultra Sphere (SUS) to steal everything

Good luck.
